TopicTitle: How do I make a pull request on Github?!

Articles.Content:
Okay I want to make a request for real plume on Github and can't make one! I've got an account and verified it and everything.

Please help

- - - Updated - - -

Click the link that says "compare across forks" and then select your fork.

You have to have already created a fork, downloaded it, made your change, pushed that change up to github (in your fork) - and then and only then can you push the "create pull request" button.

If you're just trying to make a request, you want an "issue" not a "pull request".
